text: I've implemented some particular abstract arrays, and now I want to optimize broadcasting on them. So, started digging there and I must say it seems scary, with all the `BroadcastStyle` stuff... Is there some simple reference, tutorial or guidance of some sort out there on how to modify broadcasting behaviour in simple situations, without becoming an expert? Thanks!
